definition: to fail to come out on time/to miss a deadline
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: If the weather keeps raining, the sports meet will have to be postponed again.
sentences.chinese: 如果氣象接連不斷地下雨，運動會只能再脫期了。

sentences.english: It rained, therefore the sports meet was postponed.
sentences.chinese: 天下雨，所以運動會脫期了。
